summary: An Ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 3118 for the improvement of Colorado Avenue, from the south line of Atlantic Street to the south line of Massachusetts Street, all in the City of Seattle, under Ordinance No. 38001, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
